name: Flappy Tux
short_description:
This is a clone of the popular "Flappy Bird"-Game playable on Windows, Linux and Mac. Main actor is the linux-mascot Tux and with the nice graphics known from "SuperTux" you feel at home from the beginning.

Help Tux to avoid all the pipes by using only one button. But beware: This game is harder than it looks.

With your help, penguins CAN fly!
summary: Penguins can't fly? You've never been so wrong!
